sentences.en: "Well I suppose it is based on the old lunar months isn't it."— 'Yes that's right.'
sentences.cn: “噢，我想这是按照旧制阴历来算的，是吧？”——“对，是的。”

sentences.en: A ride in the lunar module's upper stage was quite an experience.
sentences.cn: 在登月舱上半截的一次驾驶,可真是一次难得的经验.

sentences.en: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
Lunar craters can be plainly seen with the aid of a small telescope.
sentences.cn: 借助小型望远镜可以看清月球上的环形山.

sentences.en: Many new aspects of lunar research will be explored by space vehicles.
sentences.cn: 月球研究的许多新方面可用宇宙飞船来探测.

sentences.en: Of special interest is the photographic determination of altitudes of lunar formation.
sentences.cn: 最有趣的是用照相来测定月面结构物的高度.

sentences.en: The astronauts piloted their craft down to the lunar surface.
sentences.cn: 宇航员驾驶太空飞船在月球表面降落.

sentences.en: The lunar stone is different from earth's.
sentences.cn: 月球的石头和地球的不同.

sentences.en: The Spring Festival is the lunar New Year.
The vast volcanic slope was eerily reminiscent of a lunar landscape.
sentences.cn: 开阔的火山坡让人心生怪异地联想起月球的地貌。

sentences.en: This lunar influence upon the calendar reaches down to our own days.
sentences.cn: 这种月对历法的影响一直延续到我们当今时代.

sentences.en: To me there was a distinct smell to the lunar material.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,月球物质确有一种特殊气味.

sentences.en: When there is solar halo , it will rain; when there is lunar halo , it will blow.
sentences.cn: 日晕而雨, 月晕而风.

sentences.en: While one of the astronauts went round the moon in the command module, the other went down to the surface in the lunar module.
sentences.cn: 当其中一名宇航员在指挥舱中环绕月球飞行时, 另一名宇航员在登月舱中降落到月球表面.

words.tran_cn: 月亮的，月球的；阴历的；银的；微亮的

phrases.tran_cn: 月运周期；太阴周；默冬章
月球探测器；[美航]绕月轨道飞行器（1966年和1967年曾绕月飞行并对月球拍摄照片）
月球车（用于探测月球表面，等于 moon car）

trans.tran_cn: 月的，月球的，阴历的，（光）苍白的，微弱的，银的，含银的
trans.tran_en: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon
